passives.name: Exploitation
passives.description: Whenever you deal damage to a target with a skill, apply an Exploitation stack to the target. Each stack of Exploitation reduces the target's (Defense Power) by 0.25% while increasing your (Defense Power) by the same amount for 20 seconds up to 20 stacks. Every subsequent stack will refresh the duration.

passives.name: Cursed Touch
passives.description: Increases the total damage of over time skills by 20%.

passives.name: Witchcraft Mastery
passives.description: Decreases global cooldown on skills by 10%.

passives.name: Arcane Corruption
passives.description: Whenever you deal damage, applies a stack of Arcane Corruption to the target every 2 seconds. Each stack of Arcane Corruption reduces the target's healing by 1% up to 15 times. When Arcane Corruption reaches 15 stacks, doubles the healing reduction for 6 seconds and remove all the remaining stacks.

passives.name: Creeping Death
passives.description: Whenever a target is below 50% health, damage over time skills deal 30% more damage.

passives.name: Bloodmancer
passives.description: Whenever you deal damage over time, heal for 10% of the dealt damage.

ravencards.name: contagious sporewalker
ravencards.description: If Death Touch (Spell) kills a target, its cooldown is reduced by 30.0%.

ravencards.name: troll warlock
ravencards.description: Hitting a target with Death Touch (Spell) now applies Empowered Curses to enemies in a medium area which deal 25.0% more damage per tick than Curse (Spell). Empowered Curses and Curse (Spell) can both be applied to the same target.

ravencards.name: ghostlamp hag
ravencards.description: When 3 stacks of Arcane Pulse (Spell) are applied on a target, it will shatter the target's (Defense Power) by 7.0% (Spell Power) for 10 seconds. The target will be immune to new stacks of Arcane Pulse (Spell) for this duration. A target affected by Shatter cannot be affected by it again for 10 seconds.

ravencards.name: hoghound shaman
ravencards.description: Whenever you cast Arcane Pulse (Spell) you have a 12.0% chance to reduce Arcane Torrent (Spell) cooldown by 3 seconds.

spells.name: Eternal Worms
spells.description: Consumes 3 of your damage over time skills on the target, dealing 50% of their remaining damage and snaring them for 1.5 seconds. It also heals you for 60% of their remaining damage. Generates 10 Aether per damage over time skill consumed.

ravencards.name: saltdusk ritualist
ravencards.description: Steals 3.0% (Attack Power) for every damage over time consumed by Eternal Worms (Spell) for 8 seconds. The amount of (Attack Power) stolen from the affected target cannot be bigger than 25% of your natural maximum (Attack Power). An already affected creature cannot have its (Attack Power) stolen again.

ravencards.name: glutton hag
ravencards.description: Eternal Worms (Spell) now apply Twilight Curse for each damage over time consumed up to 3 stacks. Twilight Curse deals 12.0% (Spell Power) spell damage to the target every 3 seconds for 15 seconds.

spells.name: Curse
spells.description: Applies a Curse that deals 45.0% (Spell Power) spell damage to the target every 3 seconds for 15 seconds. Whenever a Cursed target is defeated, generates 10 Aether.

ravencards.name: skeleton
ravencards.description: Whenever a target affected by Curse (Spell) dies, generates additional 20 Aether instead. This effect can occur once every 9.0 seconds.

ravencards.name: hog cultist
ravencards.description: Curse (Spell) now deals 6.0% more damage each tick from the previous one.

spells.name: Arcane Torrent
spells.description: Deals 30.0% (Spell Power) spell damage every 0.3 seconds for 1.5 seconds. Increases channeling duration by 0.3 seconds per 10 Aether consumed. Deals 5.0% (Spell Power) more damage per Pulse stack on target. Does not consume Pulse stacks on use.

ravencards.name: doom gazer
ravencards.description: Arcane Torrent (Spell) now deals additional 7.5% damage per Pulse stack on the target, but it consumes all Pulse stacks on use.

ravencards.name: skorn warlock
ravencards.description: Each hit of Arcane Torrent (Spell) reduces the target's (Spell Defense) by 0.8% for 8 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Of Pain
spells.description: Shackles your target for 5 seconds. If you receive damage from any source, the shackled target will also receive 25% of the damage. The shared damage increases by 5% per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: saltdusk bloodmage
ravencards.description: While Shackles of Pain (Spell) is active on the target, Leech (Spell) and Siphon ticks have an increased 30.0% effectiveness.

ravencards.name: harvester hag
ravencards.description: When targets affected by your Shackles of Pain (Spell) are healed, you are also healed by 60.0% of that amount.

spells.name: Siphon
spells.description: Drains mana from your target every second over 10 seconds, up to a total of 200.0% (Spell Power) mana drained, dealing the same amount as damage. Reduces channeling time by 1 second for every 10 Aether consumed. The total mana drained and damage dealt remain unchanged.

ravencards.name: orc spellcaster
ravencards.description: Instead of restoring your mana, Siphon now provides a magic barrier for 8 seconds equal to 90.0% of the mana drained. While this barrier is active, you have 13.0% increased skill haste.

ravencards.name: yornish frostbearer
ravencards.description: Ticks of Siphon will also reduce the target's haste by 1.2%, increasing your haste by the same amount. This bonus ends when Siphon ends. Siphons (Spell) cooldown is increased by 5 seconds.

spells.name: Dispel
spells.description: Removes 2 random beneficial effects from the target.

ravencards.name: spellslayer drake
ravencards.description: For each effect removed, heals for 120.0% (Healing Power) health.

ravencards.name: orc witchdoctor
ravencards.description: The target now receives a 6.0% (Defense Power) decrease for 8 seconds for each beneficial effect removed.

spells.name: Hex
spells.description: Turns the target into a toad for 2 seconds. Increases duration for 0.40 seconds per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: bone gazer
ravencards.description: For 8 seconds after Hex (Spell) effect expiring, the target will have 17.0% reduced (Spell Defense).

ravencards.name: crow matriarch
ravencards.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hex (Spell) by 6.0 seconds.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Creates a copy of you that mimics certain skills at 15% of their effectiveness for 15 seconds. These copies have limited range and cannot move. An additional clone is created consuming 30 Aether, and another one consuming 50 Aether. Skills Affected: Concussive Shot, Precision Shot, Quick Fire, Wind Arrow, Dawn's Light, Flash Heal, Healing Channel, Holy Force, Smite, Crippling Dagger, Arcane Pulse, Arcane Torrent, Fireball, Frost Shards, Frostbolt, Pyroblast.

ravencards.name: hell gazer
ravencards.description: Mirror Image (Spell) now deal 30.0% increased damage.

ravencards.name: warlock ezanor
ravencards.description: Instead of mirroring the caster's abilities, Mirror Image (Spell) now cast Decimating Bolt (Spell) ability. Decimating Bolt (Spell) deals 12.0% (Spell Power) spell damage of spell damage per active damage over time effect on the target, up to 3 active effects. Decimating Bolt (Spell) takes 3 seconds to cast.

spells.name: Magic Rupture
spells.description: Slows the target by 20%. Gives you 20% Movement Speed for 6 seconds.

ravencards.name: skorn grandmaster
ravencards.description: The effectiveness of Leech (Spell), Curse (Spell) and Siphon on target's under the effect of Magic Rupture (Spell) are increased by 13.0% for healing by Leech (Spell), damage done by Curse (Spell) or mana drained by Siphon.

ravencards.name: manastorm djinn
ravencards.description: Targets under the effect of Magic Rupture (Spell) take 18.0% increased damage from Arcane Pulse (Spell) and Arcane Torrent (Spell).

spells.name: Leech
spells.description: Throws a leech at the target, dealing 20.0% (Spell Power) spell damage per second for 8 seconds, healing you by the same amount.

ravencards.name: vampire necromancer
ravencards.description: When below 60% health, Leech (Spell) now heals you for 30.0% more.

ravencards.name: rubycap mushroom
ravencards.description: Basic attacks you make on targets affected by your Leech (Spell) heal you for 13.0% health of the damage dealt.
